import React from "react"; import "./MyTrip.css"; import { Container, Row, Col, Button, CardTitle, CardText, Card, FormGroup, Label, Input, Jumbotron, Media, CardBody, CardSubtitle } from "reactstrap"; // import { Card, Button, CardTitle, CardText } from "reactstrap"; function alert() { console.log("CLICK WORKED"); } const MyTrip = props => { return (
Trip: {props.tripName} {/* Description {props.description} */} Card title Card subtitle Some quick example text to build on the card title and make up the bulk of the card's content. Special Title Treatment With supporting text below as a natural lead-in to additional content. Check to List {/* */} Check to List

{/* Special Title Treatment With supporting text below as a natural lead-in to additional content. */}
); }; export default MyTrip;
